# init(blending:)

**Initializer**

Creates an object from a custom material’s blending property.

## Declaration

```swift
init(blending value: CustomMaterial.Blending)
```

## Parameters

- **value**: The custom material’s blending property.

## Discussion

This initializer creates a `PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Blending` instance using the values from an existing [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Blending-swift.enum] object.
title: init(blending:)
